SCRIPT.MSCRI:
: DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string, 30 : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_HEADER
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments ---------------------------------------------------------------
! Define action specific java options and values : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "TranslateNodeGroupRuleAction"
echo "***** Retrieving rules for the specified Node Group *****" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_CMD ! Node group name : SET &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_GROUP# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE : SET &UC4RB_PUP_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#, " -nodegroup &UC4RB_PUP_ESCAPED_STRING#")
! Access key is decrypted and send to jar as argument : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_PUP_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD export UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD="$UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD"
: PRINT &UC4RB_PUP_CMD#
output_var=`&UC4RB_PUP_CMD#` execcode=$? echo "$output_var"
if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then
echo "System error ,please check the input parameters" echo "******** LIST NODES FOR NODE GROUP ACTION FAILED ********" exit $execcode fi
echo "***** Rules has been retrieved for the specified Node Group *****"
rules=`echo "$output_var" | grep -q "DB_QUERY_OBJECT::"` execcode=$?
if [ "$execcode" -ne "0" ] then echo "UC4RB_PUP_NODE_COUNT::=0" echo "UC4RB_PUP_NODE_LIST::=" else echo "***** Retrieving Nodes for the rules *****" db_query="$(echo "$output_var" | grep -q "DB_QUERY_OBJECT::=" | sed s/DB_QUERY_OBJECT::=//g)" !List nodes : SET &ACTION_NAME# = "ListNodesAction" ! PuppetDB URL : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.PREPARE_DBCMD
: PRINT &UC4RB_PUP_DBCMD# &UC4RB_PUP_DBCMD# -filterjson "$db_query" fi
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Status messages : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LIST NODES FOR NODE GROUP ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LIST NODES FOR NODE_GROUP ACTION FAILED ********"
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PUPPET_PUPPET.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.SUDOERS_FOOTER

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
!Publish the list of classes :SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
:IF &STATUS# EQ 0 :SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_PUP_NODE*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') :PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2)
: SWITCH &KEY# : CASE "UC4RB_PUP_NODE_COUNT" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_COUNT# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_COUNT#,,"WORKFLOW"
: CASE "UC4RB_PUP_NODE_LIST" : SET &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_LIST# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_LIST#,,"WORKFLOW" : ENDSWITCH
:ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# :ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_COUNT# = "" : PSET &UC4RB_PUP_NODE_LIST# = "" :ENDIF
